publications.title: Digital Predistortion for 5G Power Amplifiers: A Deep Learning Approach
publications.journal: IEEE Transactions on Microwave Theory and Techniques
publications.abstract: This paper presents a novel deep learning-based digital predistortion (DPD) technique for linearizing 5G power amplifiers (PAs). The proposed method achieves superior linearization performance compared to traditional memory polynomial models, with a 5-10 dB improvement in adjacent channel power ratio (ACPR) reduction.

publications.title: Optimization of Impedance Matching Networks Using Smith Chart-Based Genetic Algorithms
publications.journal: IEEE Microwave and Wireless Components Letters
publications.abstract: A novel Smith chart-based genetic algorithm is proposed for optimizing impedance matching networks. The method efficiently explores the impedance space and finds optimal L-type, T-type, and Ï€-type matching networks with constraints on component values and bandwidth.

publications.title: Efficiency Enhancement of Millimeter-Wave Power Amplifiers Using Envelope Tracking
publications.abstract: This work presents an envelope tracking (ET) technique for improving the efficiency of millimeter-wave power amplifiers operating at 28 GHz. The proposed ET system achieves 10% efficiency improvement over fixed-bias operation while maintaining linearity specifications for 5G NR signals.
